title: Diepick
desc:
Post 1988
- Input any number.
- When you input a number, play this card, split the die into two dice totaling the number on the inputted die, and then play an extra turn.
- Example: you could input an 8 and get two 4s, or input an 8 and and get a 6 and a 2.
- Inputted ones turn into two ones.
